descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffff00][size=5]Bec de Corbin Eng/Rus v1.0[/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Times New Roman][size=3][color=#1e84cc]

[/color][color=#ffff00]Author:[/color]
Ronnie Magnum - mesh, textures.

[color=#ffff00]Description:[/color]
This mod adds a new weapon - Bec de Corbin. You can find it West from Whiterun at the unmarked bandit camp under a cliff. It causes 5 pts. of extra damage and can be improved with a steel ingot.


[size=3][center][size=4][size=4][size=6]***[/size][/size][/size][/center]
[size=4]
Also:[/size]

Or join me on [url=https://www.patreon.com/RonnieMagnum/overview]Patreon[/url] if you like my works![/size]
author: Ronnie Magnum
